remarks: Perform a multiply-add of two decimal integers ` M ` and ` N ` against a fixed multiplicand ` P ` (no carry).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
numma.1 $e |- T e. NN0 $.
numma.2 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
numma.3 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
numma.4 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
numma.5 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
numma.6 $e |- M = ( ( T x. A ) + B ) $.
numma.7 $e |- N = ( ( T x. C ) + D ) $.
numma.8 $e |- P e. NN0 $.
numma.9 $e |- ( ( A x. P ) + C ) = E $.
numma.10 $e |- ( ( B x. P ) + D ) = F $.
numma $p |- ( ( M x. P ) + N ) = ( ( T x. E ) + F ) $.
